item.title: 对冲基金和私募股权基金高管角逐黎巴嫩货币局局长职位
item.description: 一位私募股权投资专家、一位资深律师和一位对冲基金经理正在角逐黎巴嫩中央银行行长的职位，这是一项关键性的任命，需要通过这项任命来解决陷入困境的银行业及其数十亿美元的赤字问题。【原文：A private-equity specialist along with a senior lawyer and a hedge-fund manager are in the running to become Lebanon’s central-bank governor, a critical appointment needed to fix the troubled banking sector and its multi-billion dollar deficit.】

item.title: 凌晨三点的决战挽救了默茨改变德国游戏规则的计划
item.description: 周五凌晨，德国绿党面临抉择：他们会因为对候任总理弗里德里希-梅尔兹的不满而否决一项改变游戏规则的支出计划，还是支持他们自己几个月来一直要求的激进转变？【原文：In the early hours of Friday, Germany’s Greens were given a choice: Would they veto a game-changing spending plan over grievances with chancellor-in-waiting Friedrich Merz, or back the radical shift they themselves had been demanding for months?】

item.title: 人工智能先驱希望欧洲打造自己更灵活的前进之路
item.description: OpenAI 和 Mistral AI 所采用的机器学习方法对功率要求极高，其基本信念之一是，人工智能模型在提出新见解之前必须审查其整个数据集。【原文：One belief underlying the power-hungry approach to machine learning advanced by OpenAI and Mistral AI is that an artificial intelligence model must review its entire dataset before spitting out new insights.】

item.title: 市场让你致富。现在就保持下去
item.description: 你发财了。现在继续发财吧【原文：You got rich. Now stay rich.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称巴基斯坦审查和新气候贷款取得进展
item.description: 国际货币基金组织驻巴基斯坦代表团团长表示，国际货币基金组织和巴基斯坦政府在发放当前计划下的下一笔 10 亿美元贷款以及同意为气候相关行动提供新贷款方面取得了进展。【原文：The head of the International Monetary Fund’s mission to Pakistan said the lender and the government have made progress toward releasing the next $1 billion tranche under its current program as well as agreeing to a new loan for climate-related action.】

item.title: 韩国和美国高级官员在华盛顿举行贸易谈判
item.description: 韩国和美国高级官员在华盛顿会晤，讨论包括关税措施在内的贸易问题，双方同意继续对话。【原文：Senior South Korean and US officials met in Washington to address trade issues including tariff measures, with both sides agreeing to continue dialogue.】

item.title: 太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）在受困宇航员返回之前将宇航员送上太空
item.description: 周五，SpaceX 公司向国际空间站发射了一组宇航员，这次备受关注的任务将使被困宇航员布奇-威尔莫尔和苏尼-威廉姆斯最终返回家园。【原文：SpaceX launched a crew to the International Space Station on Friday, a closely watched mission that would allow marooned astronauts Butch Wilmore and Suni Williams to finally return home.】

item.title: 穆迪因预算风险下调罗马尼亚信用评级展望
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）下调了罗马尼亚的信用评级展望，提高了罗马尼亚被降至垃圾级的风险，因为政治动荡阻碍了罗马尼亚在重新举行总统选举前缩小预算缺口的努力。【原文：Moody’s Ratings lowered Romania’s credit score outlook, raising the risk it could be cut to junk as political turmoil hinders efforts to narrow the budget gap before a presidential election re-run.】

item.title: 穆迪将希腊评级上调至投资级
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）周五将希腊的评级地位提升至投资级，正式结束了该国自2010年开始的垃圾级评级时代。【原文：Moody’s Ratings lifted Greece’s rating status to investment grade Friday, putting an official end to the country’s junk status era that started back in 2010.】

item.title: 英特尔新任首席执行官获得价值约 6900 万美元的薪酬组合
item.description: 英特尔公司（Intel Corp.本周被任命为首席执行官的陈立武，如果在未来几年内达到目标，将获得价值约 6900 万美元的报酬。【原文：Incoming Intel Corp. Chief Executive Officer Lip-Bu Tan, who was named to the position this week, will receive compensation valued at about $69 million if he reaches targets over the coming years.】

item.description:

item.title: 经济多元化取得成效，S&P 上调沙特阿拉伯评级
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯的信用评级两年来首次被 S&P 全球评级公司（S&P Global Ratings）上调，这是因为沙特努力使经济从石油多样化中受益。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s credit rating was upgraded by S&P Global Ratings for the first time in two years, as the kingdom’s efforts to diversify the economy from oil pay off.】

item.title: 新赢家崛起，华尔街再遭特朗普混乱冲击
item.description: 这就是本-英克尔（Ben Inker）期待已久的市场。华尔街对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的关税计划大举反击，本周股市即使在周五大幅反弹后仍下跌了约 2%，Inker 是在今年的波动漩涡中赚钱的投资者之一。【原文：This is the market Ben Inker has been waiting for. In the grip of Wall Street’s big rebellion against President Donald Trump’s tariff agenda – with stocks down around 2% this week even after Friday’s big rebound – Inker is among a cohort of investors making money in this year’s volatility spiral.】

item.title: Klarna 公开申请美国 IPO，披露收入增长 24
item.description: Klarna Group Plc 公开申请在美国首次公开募股，这可能是今年最大的金融公司上市之一。【原文：Klarna Group Plc filed publicly for a US initial public offering in what could be one of the year’s biggest financial company listings.】

item.title: 特朗普加密货币沙皇萨克斯出售逾 2 亿美元投资
item.description: 根据白宫发布的一份备忘录，唐纳德-特朗普总统的人工智能和加密货币顾问大卫-萨克斯（David Sacks）及其风险投资公司 Craft Ventures 已剥离了价值超过 2 亿美元的与数字资产行业相关的持股。【原文：David Sacks, President Donald Trump’s adviser for artificial intelligence and cryptocurrencies, and his venture-capital firm Craft Ventures have divested more than $200 million worth of holdings related to the digital-asset industry, according to a memo released by the White House.】

item.title: 美国对海上咽喉的调查扩大了全球影响力
item.description: 联邦海事委员会正在调查全球海运咽喉要道，以评估某个国家、远洋承运人或其他海运运营商是否正在制造不利于美国航运和外贸的条件。【原文：The Federal Maritime Commission is investigating global maritime chokepoints to assess whether a country, ocean carrier or other maritime operator are creating conditions unfavorable for US shipping and foreign trade.】

item.title: 欧洲国家寻求更灵活的天然气储存目标
item.description: 欧盟成员国正在寻求更大的灵活性，以实现未来两年的天然气储存目标，因为目前的规定和更高的需求导致燃料价格上涨。【原文：European Union member states are seeking more flexibility to meet gas storage targets over the next two years after current provisions and higher demand added to an increase in prices of the fuel.】

item.title: Cerberus 创始人前往华盛顿，为费恩伯格之后的生活做准备
item.description: 史蒂夫-费恩伯格（Steve Feinberg）花了三十多年的时间，将 Cerberus 资本管理公司打造成为私人市场上最具侵略性的公司之一。在他前往华盛顿担任国防部第二把手之际，他于 1992 年共同创立的公司正在为没有他的日子做准备。【原文：Steve Feinberg spent more than three decades building Cerberus Capital Management into one of the most aggressive players in private markets. As he heads to Washington to take the No. 2 job at the Defense Department, the firm he co-founded in 1992 is preparing for life without him.】

item.title: 尽管比索走强，阿根廷通货紧缩仍停滞不前
item.description: 尽管哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）总统放缓了比索的月度贬值速度，但阿根廷 2 月份的通货膨胀率仍略有上升。【原文：Argentina inflation picked up slightly in February, in spite of President Javier Milei’s move to slow down the peso’s monthly depreciation.】

item.title: 比特币在全市场的 "纾困反弹 "中从四个月低点回升
item.description: 比特币从本周早些时候触及的四个月低点反弹，其他风险资产也从近期全球市场的动荡中反弹。【原文：Bitcoin rebounded from the four-month low reached earlier in the week with other risky assets bouncing back from the recent turmoil seen in global markets.】

item.title: 第一量子子公司暂停对巴拿马的诉讼
item.description: 第一量子矿业有限公司（First Quantum Minerals Ltd）在当地的子公司巴拿马科布雷公司（Cobre Panama）指示其律师与政府的法律团队会面，并暂停就该公司在巴拿马已关闭的铜矿对巴拿马提起仲裁诉讼。【原文：Cobre Panama, the local subsidiary of First Quantum Minerals Ltd, instructed its lawyers to meet with the government’s legal team and suspend its arbitration suits against Panama over the firm’s shuttered copper mine in the country.】

item.title: 美国和欧盟官员探讨如何推进特朗普的贸易战
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收金属关税引发贸易战之后，欧盟行政机构高级成员和美国官员周五举行会谈，探讨如何向前迈进。【原文：Senior members of the European Union’s executive arm and US officials spoke on Friday to explore ways to move forward after US President Donald Trump’s metals tariffs prompted a trade war.】

item.title: 苹果公司 Siri 首席执行官称人工智能延迟既丑陋又令人尴尬，并承诺进行修复
item.description: 苹果公司负责监督 Siri 虚拟助手的高层管理人员告诉员工，关键功能的延误既难看又令人尴尬，而在该技术准备就绪之前就公开推广的决定更是雪上加霜。【原文：Apple Inc.’s top executive overseeing its Siri virtual assistant told staff that delays to key features have been ugly and embarrassing, and a decision to publicly promote the technology before it was ready made matters worse.】

item.title: 石油在休斯顿的返乡之旅因贸易战和价格下跌而黯然失色
item.description: 本周齐聚休斯顿的石油高管们深刻认识到，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普支持化石燃料的议程是有代价的：价格下降。【原文：Oil executives gathering in Houston this week learned the hard way that US President Donald Trump’s pro-fossil fuel agenda comes with a catch: lower prices.】

item.title: 加州保险业主管支持州立农场将费率上调 22
item.description: 加利福尼亚州保险专员里卡多-拉拉（Ricardo Lara）表示，他计划批准将州立农场投保人的费率紧急上调 22%，但要等待下个月的公开听证会，此举旨在稳定洛杉矶地区毁灭性野火后的州保险市场。【原文：California Insurance Commissioner Ricardo Lara said he plans to approve a 22% emergency rate increase for State Farm policyholders, pending a public hearing next month, in a move aimed at stabilizing the state’s insurance market after the Los Angeles area’s devastating wildfires.】

item.title: 在七国集团会议上，美国盟友的高级外交官们想知道卢比奥的立场
item.description: 在加拿大的一个山区疗养地，一些美国最亲密的盟友试图通过私下谈话和公开互动来推测国务卿马可-卢比奥（Marco Rubio）与其上司的真实立场。【原文：At a Canadian mountain retreat, some of the US’s closest allies tried to divine over private conversations and public interactions where Secretary of State Marco Rubio really stands vis-a-vis his boss.】

item.title: 哈佛法学院学生希望 530 亿美元基金与以色列断绝关系
item.description: 哈佛大学法学院的学生投票要求该校 530 亿美元的捐赠基金从 "武器、监控技术 "和其他与以色列有关联的公司中撤资，这一象征性的投票再次引起了人们对这场引起特朗普政府愤怒的抗议运动的关注。【原文：Harvard Law School students voted to demand the university’s $53 billion endowment divest from “weapons, surveillance technology” and other companies tied to Israel, a symbolic vote that brings renewed attention to a protest movement that has drawn the Trump administration’s ire.】

item.title: 马克-拉斯里称，在特朗普的不确定性下，经济 "无法生存
item.description: 大道资本集团（Avenue Capital Group）创始人之一、亿万富翁马克-拉西里（Marc Lasry）说，唐纳德-特朗普总统政策的不确定性，尤其是关税政策的不确定性，正在阻碍希望抓住市场机遇的投资者。【原文：Marc Lasry, the billionaire co—founder of Avenue Capital Group, said the uncertainty over President Donald Trump’s policies, particularly on tariffs, is stalling investors looking to take advantage of market opportunities.】
